content: Thank you Roseland. However you obtained your wisdom and objectivity is exactly the principles and actions that only white America can take to eradicate racism in America. The NAACP long argued that racism is just as harmful to whites as it is to minorities. If we are to live up to the principles & values the flawed writers of the US Constitution wrote, then the original stain must end or the ominous history of other once great nations will be repeated. No one is truly free until racism ends. Nor can anyone critically think when the ease of blaming outsiders for all problems experienced is acceptable practice. Instead whites must look to uncover the root cause of problems and fears (as we all must)by education, curiosity & openess to individual, economic, political, or spiritual issues so real change can occur to build a better society. Again, thank you for waking.
